data.message: Hey Facebook, I've contacted you multiple multiple times now to get my message situation resolved for one of the business pages I manage. My first message was Feb. 3 and my last message last week. Not fixing this is causing issues with managing our business page, and I cannot get anyone to respond. What gives? How can I get it fixed or at least have someone respond?

replies.message: Hi Kimberly. For inquiries about your Page, Ads, and other business related questions, please reach out to our team at facebook.com/marketing. Thanks. -Rey

Facebook Thanks Rey for the quick reply. It's not a question about our page or ads. Our messenger function is not working and we are missing messages by not being able to view them from any computer. I cannot get anyone to reply to fix it.
Hi Facebook - reached out on the business page, still no reply. How can I get this fixed?
